mapper.select: select g.u_email , b.b_idx, b.b_type, b.b_title , b.b_thumbnail , b.b_url , b.b_date , b.b_company , b.b_member , b.b_content , ( select COUNT(*) from ssafy_trot.Good g left outer join ssafy_trot.Board b on b.b_type = g.b_type and b.b_idx = g.b_idx where b.b_type = g.b_type and b.b_idx = g.b_idx and g.u_email = #{u_email} and b.b_type = #{b_type} ) as b_cnt, ( select COUNT(*) from ssafy_trot.Reply r where 1=1 and r.b_type = b.b_type and r.b_idx = b.b_idx ) as br_cnt, ( select COUNT(*) from ssafy_trot.Good gg where gg.b_type = g.b_type and gg.b_idx = g.b_idx ) as good_cnt from ssafy_trot.Good g left outer join ssafy_trot.Board b on b.b_type = g.b_type and b.b_idx = g.b_idx where g.u_email = #{u_email} and b.b_type = #{b_type};
select u_email, f.s_idx, s.s_name , s.s_img from ssafy_trot.`Following` f left outer join ssafy_trot.Singer s on s.s_idx = f.s_idx where u_email = #{userEmail};
